languages.text: "Понимаю, что случившееся тебе неприятно. Но это не делает людей животными".
"I understand that this incident was unpleasant for you. But it does not mean that all humans are animals."
languages.original_text: "Понимаю, что случившееся тебе неприятно. Но это не делает людей животными".

traits.locale_text: "I understand that what took place is unpleasant for you. But it doesn't mean that all people are animals"
"I understand that what took place is unpleasant for you. But it doesn't mean that all people are animals"
"I understand that this incident was unpleasant for you. But it does not mean that all humans are animals."
"I understand that this incident was unpleasant for you. But it does not mean that all humans are animals."
"I understand that this incident was unpleasant for you. But it does not mean that all humans are animals."

languages.text: “我理解这件事情让你很不愉快，但并非所有人类都是野兽。”
languages.original_text: "I understand that this incident was unpleasant for you. But it does not mean that all humans are animals."

traits.locale_text: “我理解这件事情让你很不愉快，但并非所有人类都是野兽。”

languages.text: «Me hago cargo de que el incidente ha sido desagradable para ti. Pero eso no quiere decir que todos los humanos seamos animales».
languages.original_text: "I understand that this incident was unpleasant for you. But it does not mean that all humans are animals."

traits.locale_text: «Me hago cargo de que el incidente ha sido desagradable para ti. Pero eso no quiere decir que todos los humanos seamos animales».

languages.text: « Je veux bien croire que cet incident a été une expérience désagréable pour vous, mais les humains ne sont pas tous des animaux pour autant. »
languages.original_text: "I understand that this incident was unpleasant for you. But it does not mean that all humans are animals."

traits.locale_text: « Je veux bien croire que cet incident a été une expérience désagréable pour vous, mais les humains ne sont pas tous des animaux pour autant. »

languages.text: "Ich verstehe, dass der Vorfall unangenehm für Euch war. Aber das bedeutet nicht, dass alle Menschen Tiere sind."
languages.original_text: "I understand that this incident was unpleasant for you. But it does not mean that all humans are animals."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe, dass der Vorfall unangenehm für Euch war. Aber das bedeutet nicht, dass alle Menschen Tiere sind."

languages.text: 「この出来事がお前にとって不快なものであったことは理解している。しかし、すべての人間が獣であるということを意味するものではない」
languages.original_text: "I understand that this incident was unpleasant for you. But it does not mean that all humans are animals."

traits.locale_text: 「この出来事がお前にとって不快なものであったことは理解している。しかし、すべての人間が獣であるということを意味するものではない」

languages.text: "Bu durumun canını sıktığını anlıyorum. Fakat bu, tüm insanların birer hayvan olduğu anlamına gelmez."
languages.original_text: "I understand that this incident was unpleasant for you. But it does not mean that all humans are animals."

traits.locale_text: "Bu durumun canını sıktığını anlıyorum. Fakat bu, tüm insanların birer hayvan olduğu anlamına gelmez."
